mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK(user_no, date, arrival_time) values(#{userNo}, curdate(), curtime())
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET leave_time = curtime() WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND date = curdate()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WORK WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND date = curdate() AND arrival_time IS NOT NULL
SELECT w.date, u.name, w.user_no, w.arrival_time, w.leave_time FROM work w JOIN user u ON w.user_no = u.user_no WHERE w.user_no = #{userNo}
